snippet: Nick Kyrgios teases that it was "love at first sight" when he met Andy Murray but the jokey banter will stop when the Australian takes aim at the world number two and Wimbledon title favorite on Monday....
lead_paragraph: Nick Kyrgios teases that it was "love at first sight" when he met Andy Murray but the jokey banter will stop when the Australian takes aim at the world number two and Wimbledon title favorite on Monday.

headline.print_headline: No Joke as Kyrgios Sets Sights on Murray
headline.main: No Joke as Kyrgios Sets Sights on Murray
